law.catch_line: A person who violates any provision of Subtitle 4, except §§ 21-425 and 21-436 of this title is gu...
law.text: A person who violates any provision of Subtitle 4, except §§ 21-425 and 21-436 of this title is guilty of a misdemeanor and on conviction is subject to a fine not exceeding $100.
